channel.title: Playing server trough VPS?
channel.description: well, about 2 days ago my computer crashed :eek: so i have to borrow my dads computer... last time i borrowed it i dled some shit and his boss got pissed and got a security system so that now you cant even install java LMAO so i wonder if i buy a vps so i can host my server, can i also play the server trough the VPS? or is that just impossible? because if i buy the vps and i cant play my server only code it, it wont be so fun for me lol.......

item.title: Playing server trough VPS?

item.description:
@jailed wrote:

oh, ok didnt know that
